languages.text: Планетарные власти развернули суровые чистки против инакомыслящих, мутантов и неверующих. Серия арестов и казней держит народ в страхе.
The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.
languages.original_text: Планетарные власти развернули суровые чистки против инакомыслящих, мутантов и неверующих. Серия арестов и казней держит народ в страхе.

traits.locale_text: The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.

The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.

languages.text: Las autoridades del planeta han iniciado una rigurosa purga de disidentes, mutantes y apóstatas. Esta racha de arrestos y ejecuciones tiene aterrada a la población.
languages.original_text: The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.

traits.locale_text: Las autoridades del planeta han iniciado una rigurosa purga de disidentes, mutantes y apóstatas. Esta racha de arrestos y ejecuciones tiene aterrada a la población.

languages.text: Les autorités planétaires procèdent à des purges systématiques visant les dissidents, les mutants et les apostats. Les innombrables arrestations et exécutions ont plongé la population dans la terreur.
languages.original_text: The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.

traits.locale_text: Les autorités planétaires procèdent à des purges systématiques visant les dissidents, les mutants et les apostats. Les innombrables arrestations et exécutions ont plongé la population dans la terreur.

languages.text: 行星政府开始对不同政见者、变种人与叛教者实施严酷的清洗。在疯狂的逮捕与处决之下，整颗行星人心惶惶。
languages.original_text: The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.

traits.locale_text: 行星政府开始对不同政见者、变种人与叛教者实施严酷的清洗。在疯狂的逮捕与处决之下，整颗行星人心惶惶。

languages.text: 惑星当局は反体制派、変異体、背教者の徹底的な粛清を開始した。逮捕や処刑が相次ぎ、人々は恐怖に怯えている。
languages.original_text: The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.

traits.locale_text: 惑星当局は反体制派、変異体、背教者の徹底的な粛清を開始した。逮捕や処刑が相次ぎ、人々は恐怖に怯えている。

languages.text: Die planetaren Behörden haben mit einer gnadenlosen Säuberung von Dissidenten, Mutanten und Apostaten begonnen. Die Welle von Verhaftungen und Hinrichtungen sorgt für Panik unter der Bevölkerung.
languages.original_text: The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.

traits.locale_text: Die planetaren Behörden haben mit einer gnadenlosen Säuberung von Dissidenten, Mutanten und Apostaten begonnen. Die Welle von Verhaftungen und Hinrichtungen sorgt für Panik unter der Bevölkerung.

languages.text: Muhaliflere, mutantlara ve caygınlara karşı gezegen yetkililerince tasfiye uygulanmakta. Tutuklanma ve idam haberleri halkı korkutuyor.
languages.original_text: The planetary authorities have begun a rigorous purge of dissidents, mutants, and apostates. The spree of arrests and executions has the people terrified.
